channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 14:37 The threat of shelling! Now in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire.
item.description: 🔴 14:37 The threat of shelling! Now in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
? This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
